Q_DESC: There are four person Esai, Ruban, Surya and Siva. They are provided with sugar, cashews, water and salt. Total quantity of the products will be given along with the amount they can utilize. Each of them have to say about their need from the maximum available product. Availability should be known to all after each of their utilisation and finally all have got or in starvation should be known to all. Here the person and product may vary.
